description.value:
Veteran

You served in combat as part of an organized hierarchy. Whether you were a soldier, guard, or even a knight, you’ve grown accustomed to following orders and trusting in your comrades and superiors. Having allies to back you up can give you the courage to charge against any enemy.

Ability Score Increase. Your Strength increases by 1. Your Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution increases by 1.

Armor Familiarity. You are proficient with light and medium armor. @Compendium[5e-stat-decoupled.abilities.R659PMBQVFKF0AC6]{Armor Familiarity}

Tactical Advance. As a bonus action, you can move a distance up to your walking speed directly towards a hostile creature. @Compendium[5e-stat-decoupled.abilities.CZJTKPPMFJR8KEY5]{Tactical Advance}

Skills. Choose one from: Athletics, Insight, Intimidation, Medicine, Perception.

Other. You gain proficiency with a weapon, gaming set, smith’s tools, leatherworker’s tools, or a language of your choice.
